## Hong Kong Banking Disclosure Statement

Cathay Bank is a subsidiary of Cathay General Bancorp. The following disclosure pertains to the Cathay Bank Hong Kong Branch only, and is made pursuant to the Banking (Disclosure) Rules issued by the Hong Kong Monetary Authority under section 60A of the Hong Kong Banking Ordinance.

The information contained in these documents is unaudited.
